title: Chances to win prizes worth 300 crores at Hong Kong Summer Fun
text:
Chances to win prizes worth 300 crores at Hong Kong Summer Fun Published on : Friday, July 31, 2015
Get set to kick start your summer fun with exciting gifts and prizes in Asia’s World city- Hong Kong. The spectacular shopping-plus-entertainment campaign Hong Kong Summer Fun from June 15 to August 31 is surely a lifetime thrilling experience for the visitors on tourism products and hotel rooms.
Lined up with activities and tempting offers too good to miss, trip to Hong Kong this summer is filled up with competitions and attractive prizes as huge as 300 crores.
Not only this it also allows visitors to take part in two lucky draws – “Instant Mega Draw” upon arrival that guarantees prizes for everyone and “Return to Hong Kong like a Millionaire” upon departure.
Massive rewards for the visitors at the Hong Kong Summer Fun upon the lucky draws
Excitement upon arrival – Instant Mega Draw (Total value of prizes: around Rs. 300 crores) When visitors land at Hong Kong International Airport, they can take part in the “Instant Mega Draw” to be immediately given a “Free 7-Day csl Wi-Fi Pass” and prizes including around Rs. 8000UnionPay Card spending credits, four-day, three-night cruise trips, tickets for attractions, Rs.8000 shopping mall cash coupons, and dining vouchers Tourbillon, Titus (Titus) diamond watch, Apple Watch, Disneyland hotel accommodation, Rolls Royce airport transfers, Sony E4G mobile phones, as well as Disneyland, ocean Park, Madame Tussauds, the sky 100 and other free attractions tickets. Visitors who bring along their “Welcome Pack” (to be distributed at the Pre-immigration Hall of HKIA) and show their valid travel document can participate in e-lucky draw at Lucky Draw Booth once to get one prize. Booth opens from 0900 – 2300.
Unforgettable departures – Return to Hong Kong like a Millionaire lucky draw (Total value of prizes: over Rs. 2 crores) before leaving Hong Kong, visitors can enter the “Return to Hong Kong like a Millionaire” lucky draw. The 10 winners will be able to take one friend or family member on a luxury four-day, three-night return trip to Hong Kong. Not only will they travel in business class tickets sponsored by Cathay Pacific or Dragon air, but they will also receive over Rs. 4 Lakhs Union Pay Card spending credit, luxury mobile phones offered by CSL Mobile Limited, a luxury hotel stay, 10 Michelin-starred dining experiences, and VIP tours offered by attractions. Upon departure, visitors can participate in the draw by filling and dropping the VIP Card (included in the “Welcome Pack” distributed at the pre-immigration hall of HKIA) into the draw ticket collection boxes. The draw and result announcement will be conducted in September.
Deluxe accommodation and other VIP offers
Citywide spending offers Members of the Quality Tourism Services Association, other merchants from the retail, catering and hotel sectors, and attractions will roll out special offers during the campaign period. Visitors can also download e-coupons from the HKTB website and the “My Hong Kong Guide” mobile application to enjoy a host of offers.
In addition Indians will enjoy eye catching and super attractive hotel accommodation offers where you get one night absolutely free on booking for three nights while others will allow guests who stay three consecutive nights or more to be fully reimbursed with dining credits for use in their restaurants
So treat yourself by enjoying exceptional shopping offers, savoring in top Michelin star restaurants, visiting Hong Kong’s hottest attractions for free and experiencing five-star accommodation.
In addition, download the “My Hong Kong Guide” mobile application to make the most of your trip to Hong Kong with discounts and offers on flights, accommodation, tours, dining, shopping and attractions via e-coupons.
With these flurry of activities and irresistible promos, spending summer in Asia’s World City promises a grand time for every visitor.
